page.description: The A5_Security_Option() function displays the appropriate dialog box to perform a security function. Invokes one of the security menu options. Option matches the wording on the menu. e.g. "Set Database Password"

item.name: "Set Database Password" = Master Password tab of the Set Database Master Password dialog.
"Change Master Password" = Change Database Master Password dialog.
"Change Security Settings" = User Accounts tab of the Change Database Security Settings dialog.
"Remove Database Password" = Remove Database Password dialog.
"Define Users and Groups" = Users tab of the Users and Groups dialog.
